org.osmdroid.tileprovider.util

Class CloudmadeUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osmdroid.tileprovider.util.CloudmadeUtil

  • public class CloudmadeUtil
extends Object
    Utility class for implementing Cloudmade authorization. See http://developers.cloudmade.com/projects/show/auth The CloudMade token is persisted because it doesn't change: http://support.cloudmade.com/answers/api-keys-and-authentication "you will always get the same token for the unique user id"
